bug.author: simonm3
bug.summary: fails with category columns on sample
bug.description: With a very large file it can be useful to analyse a sample. However this fails for category columns as max_freq is zero (see below error). More generally would be useful if any columns generating an error could just show as "error" as remainder of the report is still useful. ~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\report.py in _format_row(freq, label, max_freq, row_template, n, extra_class) 56 57 def _format_row(freq, label, max_freq, row_template, n, extra_class=''): ---> 58 width = int(freq / max_freq * 99) + 1 59 if width > 20: 60 label_in_bar = freq ValueError: cannot convert float NaN to integer

comments.comment: Thank you for your report. This is resolved in [<denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/commit/41225e4ca2c9485130d7bb50edb727b1eae1883a>41225e4</denchmark-link> ].
